text: They held broad discussions on mutual interest and the Premier invited Ms. Scotland for a visit to Sri Lanka.Meanwhile, the United Nations Under-Secretary-General for Political Affairs Jeff Feltman met Prime Minister Wickremesinghe in New York recently.They discussed regarding the formation of Constitution of Sri Lanka as well as the reconciliation process.Commonwealth Secretary General Patricia Scotland met Prime Minister Ranil Wickremeisnghe at UN Permanent Representatives office in New York recently. They held broad discussions on mutual interest and the Premier invited Ms. Scotland for a visit to Sri Lanka.Meanwhile, the United Nations Under-Secretary-General for Political Affairs Jeff Feltman met Prime Minister Wickremesinghe in New York recently.They discussed regarding the formation of Constitution of Sri Lanka as well as the reconciliation process.
title: PM invites Commonwealth Secretary General to Sri Lanka
